segments.text: I thought he only liked to listen !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was before he heard Stanley sing ! I guess he couldn't stand it any more , so he decided to give it a try himself !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( Sound of Allen singing ) Hey , Allen has a really good voice ! He sounds like Johnny Dean !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And he can move . too ! He dances like Ricky Martin !
segments.speaker: S1
